Copying and Printing Server Log Data

You can copy data from the server log window to the Windows clipboard. From the clipboard, you can paste the data into applications such as Microsoft Word or Notepad. This feature is available on Windows platforms only.

Note: You can perform this function only on servers that are currently running.

To copy and print data from a server log file:

  1. From the Server Administration dialog, do one of the following:

  2. Click Accounts bar in the lower left pane, and select the Server Log shortcut.

  3. From the menu, select Tools > Administration > Server Log.

    4. The Server Log dialog opens.

  4. Select the data you want to copy.

  5. Press Cntrl + C.

  6. Click OK to exit the dialog.

  7. Using Cntrl + V, paste the information into a text editor or word processing application.

  8. Select File > Print from the menu to print the data.
